name: Ship Wrecked
description:
This is an underwater shipwreck scene I threw together after trying out the Vive Demo.It's nowhere near as beautiful or polished and it's not optimized or anything so a 980 is prefered. You can't really use the leap for much. You can slap the fish, but they don't really react appropriately. Still working on that part.

Al and all it was just a nice environment that I wanted to share. The whale is worth waiting a few seconds for.
